description: This file defines a Data Access Object (DAO) interface for Note, facilitating database operations related to notes in an Android application using Room persistence library.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Interface annotated with @Dao that provides methods to perform database operations for Note entities.

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all notes ordered by update time in descending order.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Suspending function to fetch a note by its ID.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a note into the database, replacing on conflict, and returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Suspending function to update a note.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Suspending function to delete a specific note.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Suspending function to delete a note by its ID.

methods.name: observeSearch
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of notes matching search query and optional tag, ordered by update time.
